Trigger.Name: TR_USR_PROSPECTSPONSOR_CONVERSION_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL:
create trigger TR_USR_PROSPECTSPONSOR_CONVERSION_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_PROSPECTSPONSOR_CONVERSION_BUSINESSPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin
delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = '1e694cd7-2602-45f8-a718-0f3b989c7235'; -- guid is the ID from business process spec - see ProspectConversion.BusinessProcess.xml end
